sentences.english: They are the last line, they have no way to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他們是最後一道崗，他們無路可退了。

sentences.english: After sightseeing, have lunch with Bhaktapur yogurt.
sentences.chinese: 參觀完畢之後會提供午餐，附帶巴德崗酸奶。

sentences.english: The Fangshan granodiorite pluton of Lower Cretaceous occupies the middle of core.
sentences.chinese: 核部有強力侵位的早白堊世的房山花崗閃長巖株。

sentences.english: Alisa: It wasn't too much of a culture shock because I grew up in Rowland Heights, Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 文化衝擊倒是還好，因爲我從小生長在洛杉磯羅蘭崗。

sentences.english: The escarpments are sustained by rock.
Luobogang Slope is at the new site within Hanyuan County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 四川省漢源新縣城蘿蔔崗邊坡位於新縣城場址內。

sentences.english: And then to the admissibility of post operational test and receive the admission ticket booking and express certificates.
sentences.chinese: 然後到業務受理崗預約考試並領取准考證和速遞憑證。

sentences.english: Escape from Ohorh-Gom prison  is impossible!
sentences.chinese: 想從長崗監獄逃走絕對不可能。
